EmailTemplate.description: used when customers want to change their website tier
EmailTemplate.name: Website Tier - Change
EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Website Tier Change - Please "Accept"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Client_First_Name__c},
This email confirms that Customer is changing its AdverSite tier from {!Case.KeyWord_2__c} to {!Case.KeyWord_3__c}, as set forth herein. As noted below, to accept the terms and conditions of this Change Order, please reply to this e-mail with "Accept" in the body.
This Change Order changes the Agreement in effect between Yodle and Customer. Capitalized terms used in this Change Order but not defined herein have the meaning set forth in the Agreement.
Customer is hereby changing its AdverSite tier from {!Case.KeyWord_2__c} to {!Case.KeyWord_3__c}. For a detailed feature list, please refer to the {!Case.KeyWord_3__c} information packet.
The additional one-time fee for the AdverSite, as amended by this Change Order, will be {!Case.Budget__c}, to be billed immediately.
Except as modified by this Change Order, all of the terms and provisions of the Agreement remain in full force and effect.
This Change Order becomes effective on the date accepted by Customer. Customer accepts this Change Order by replying to this e-mail with “Accept”. This action creates an electronic signature that has the same legal force and effect as a handwritten signature on a written contract under any applicable law or regulation, and is equally binding.
Please contact your Yodle sales representative if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
Yodle Contracts Team contracts@yodle.com
